full_description:
APC E3SUPS20KH Easy UPS 3S 20kVA 400V 3:3 Online UPS

The APC E3SUPS20KH Easy UPS 3S 20kVA 400V 3:3 Online UPS is a reliable power solution for critical systems. Its 20.0kVA capacity and 20.0kWatts load capacity for demanding environments provide dependable power delivery. The operational parameters can be monitored thanks to its LCD. To ensure flexibility in a range of power scenarios, the Online UPS operates with an input frequency range of 45 - 65 Hz and an input voltage range of 304 - 477V. Additional supported voltages include 380V and 415V. It maximizes efficiency with an input power factor of 0.99 at full load. Clean power delivery is maintained because there is less than 3% output voltage distortion. With a low output voltage THD of less than 3% under linear load, the APC E3SUPS20KH Easy UPS 3S 20kVA 400V Online UPS supports output frequencies of 50 Hz and 60 Hz sync to mains. It guarantees quiet operation with a noise level of 60.0 dBA while operating. The UPS has an integrated maintenance bypass for smooth maintenance operations and an external battery system for increased runtime. Double conversion online topology offers the best possible performance and reliability. The APC E3SUPS20KH Easy UPS 3S 20kVA Online UPS can operate in overload conditions for up to 60 seconds at 150% and 10 minutes at 125%. For improved connectivity and monitoring, use the E3S_Parallel and E3S_TempSensor interface ports. It guarantees safety and effective heat dissipation thanks to its IP20 protection class and online thermal dissipation of 3071.0 BTU/hr.

full_description:
APC SRC10KUXI Smart-UPS RC 10KVA 230V Online UPS

The APC SRC10KUXI Smart-UPS RC 10KVA 230V Online UPS is a reliable power solution with a 10000 VA capacity and a 9000 W load capacity, it guarantees dependable power supply for delicate equipment. The device has an LCD for simple power status management and monitoring. It can handle a variety of power scenarios with an input voltage range of 160 to 285 V and a frequency auto-sensing between 40 and 70 Hz. A precise frequency control range of 47 to 53 Hz for 50 Hz nominal sync to mains, or +/- 1 Hz sync to mains for flexibility, is available for the output voltage options, which include 230 V. With minimal harmonic distortion (<2%), it produces a sine wave output even when subjected to fully non-linear load conditions. With 94.4% at full load and 94.5% at half load, efficiency is high and ensures little energy waste. An external battery system ensures extended backup time and a built-in static bypass allows for a smooth transition during power fluctuations in the APC SRC10KUXI Smart-UPS RC 10KVA 230V Online UPS. A dust filter and an IP20 degree of protection are two safety features that protect the APC SRC10KUXI Smart-UPS RC 10KVA 230V Online UPS from environmental hazards. To maintain system integrity under stress, it also provides overload protection, enabling operation at 125% load for 60 seconds and at 150% load for 30 seconds.

full_description:
APC SRC3KUXI Smart-UPS RC 3KVA 230V Online UPS

The APC SRC3KUXI Smart-UPS RC 3KVA 230V Online UPS, which operates as a double conversion online UPS, ensures continuous power delivery by converting AC input power to DC and then back to AC, providing seamless protection against power interruption. It supports a range of loads with a power factor of 0.8, both leading and trailing, with a power output capacity of 3KVA or 2400W. The UPS supports multiple devices with its flexible output connectivity options, which include two IEC 60320 C13 connectors and a hard wire 3-wire output connection. Its external battery system improves backup capacity and guarantees continuous operation in the event of a power outage. With an input voltage range of 140V to 280V and a stable output voltage of 230V that can be adjusted to 220V or 240V, the APC SRC3KUXI Smart-UPS RC 3KVA 230V Online UPS is appropriate for a variety of environments. Less than 3% harmonic distortion in the sine wave output waveform of the unit guarantees compatibility with sensitive equipment. With rates of 93% at full load and 92.3% at half load, efficiency is maximized. A quick transfer time of 4 ms ensures a smooth transition to battery power when needed. In addition to built-in bypass functionality for increased reliability, the APC SRC3KUXI Smart-UPS RC 3KVA 230V Online UPS also features surge protection and noise suppression to protect connected devices. Users are informed of system status through audible and visual alarms, with priority given to alarm severity for effective monitoring.

APC SRC6KUXI Smart-UPS RC 6KVA 230V Online UPS

The APC SRC6KUXI Smart-UPS RC 6KVA 230V Online UPS is a high-performance power management solution that functions as a double conversion online UPS. It provides dependable power by converting AC input power to DC and then back to AC, providing continuous protection against power outages. It supports a broad variety of loads with a rated power capacity of 6000 VA or 5400 W, and its external battery system improves backup capability for longer runtime during power outages. To ensure compatibility with a wide range of devices, the APC SRC6KUXI Smart-UPS RC 6KVA 230V Online UPS maintains a stable output voltage of 230V with options for 220V or 240V. The input voltage limits, which span from 160V to 285V, offer versatility for usage in various settings. A hard wire 3-wire connection type facilitates output connectivity and a sine wave output waveform with less than 5% harmonic distortion guarantees equipment compatibility. The APC SRC6KUXI Smart-UPS RC 6KVA 230V Online UPS has a 480 J surge energy rating, noise suppression features to safeguard connected devices, and an integrated static bypass for increased dependability. It has auto-sensing network frequency capabilities between 40 and 70 Hz, and its response time and surge protection adhere to UL 1449 standards.

full_description:
APC SRV3KUXI-IN Easy UPS 2U 3KVA 230V Online UPS

The APC SRV3KUXI-IN Easy UPS 2U 3KVA 230V Online UPS is a compact and dependable power solution designed specifically for critical applications. By converting AC input power to DC and back again, it functions as a double conversion online UPS, ensuring smooth power delivery and providing strong protection against power outages and fluctuations. Its 3000 VA or 2400 W power capacity allows it to support a wide range of loads, and its external battery system improves backup capability for longer runtime in an emergency. With options for 220V or 240V, the APC SRV3KUXI-IN Easy UPS 2U 3KVA 230V Online UPS consistently maintains 230V output voltages, guaranteeing compatibility with a variety of devices. Flexibility for deployment in a variety of environments is provided by input voltage limits that range from 110V to 280V under half load and from 160V to 280V under full load. Three India 3-pin 6A connectors and a hard wire 3-wire output connection type enable output connectivity. Due to its small 2U rack unit design, the APC SRV3KUXI-IN Easy UPS 2U 3KVA 230V Online UPS is appropriate for installations with limited space. It is compatible with sensitive equipment because it has a sine wave output waveform with a maximum harmonic distortion of 3% and an auto-sensing network frequency that spans from 40 Hz to 70 Hz. At full load, efficiency is rated at 90%, which maximizes energy consumption. To meet specific needs, the APC SRV3KUXI-IN Easy UPS 2U 3KVA 230V Online UPS can be set up with nominal output voltages of 220V, 230V, or 240V. To increase reliability, it has an internal bypass system that can be operated manually or automatically.
